content: CHICAGO  Aug 16 A test that scans blood for tumor-specific DNA identified early-stage cancer in more than half of 138 patients with the disease  U.S. researchers reported on Wednesday  marking a new milestone in the rush for so-called "liquid biopsies."

title: 'Liquid biopsy' spots early-stage cancers in blood -U.S. study
